game.template.bufferstrategy

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.template.bufferstrategy.GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the state of game and all of its elements. This class also handles user inputs, which affect the game state.

        public int setZombiesLife(int zombieRow,
                          int zombieX,
                          int lawnMakerCol)
        When lawn maker arrives, changes zombies life state to show them the way they are.
        Parameters:
        zombieRow - as row of zombie
        zombieX - as x coordinate of zombie
        lawnMakerCol - as column of the cell that lawn maker is in that
        Returns:
        decrement of zombie's life state

        public boolean moveLawnMovers(int zombieX,
                              int row)
        Moves lawn makers when a zombie arrives and if lawn maker is not available the player will lose.
        Parameters:
        zombieX - as x coordinate of zombie
        row - as row of zombie

      • killZombies

        public void killZombies()
        Iterates zombies and peashooter lists and calls killer mothodas

      • checkZombies

        public void checkZombies()
        Iterates all zombie lists and checks their action based on the cells they are in and the flowers. Zombies stop till they or flowers are alive, Zombies will die if they receive to squash or cherryBomb

      • changeFlower

        public boolean changeFlower(int zombieLoc,
                            int life,
                            int decrement)
        Changes flower based on its life state when zombie received to it and stops
        Parameters:
        zombieLoc - location of zombie and flower
        life - as flower life state
        decrement - as decrement of flower life state based on zombie effect
        Returns:
        true if flower is still alive and false if it is not alive anymore and has been removed.

      • removeStoppedPea

        public void removeStoppedPea(int loc)
        After dying a zombie, removes the location of peashooter that its peas were stopped by zombie
        Parameters:
        loc - as location of pea shooter/ freeze pea shooter.

      • findColumn

        public static int findColumn(int x)
        find columns number of a location
        Parameters:
        x - as x coordinate
        Returns:
        column number

      • findLoc

        public static int findLoc(int x,
                          int y)
        Finds the row and the column of the chosen cell.
        Parameters:
        x - of clicked location
        y - of clicked location
        Returns:
        chosen location in the form of yx -> row*10 + column

      • getStoppedPeas

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getStoppedPeas()
        Returns the information of peas which are stopped by zombies
        Returns:
        HashMap , key: location of pea shooter, value: x coordinate tha this peashooter's peas are stopped
